review_title: Great culture but lack of opportunity
pros: There's a supportive management team with the chief executive promoting a coaching culture that enables people to grow and develop at their own pace. You are given a lot of autonomy.
cons: There's not a lot of room for development. Many people have been there a long time and senior staff aren't going anywhere so don't leave space for new people to move into roles. Some staff have been there too long and aren't encouraged to develop.
